author: Neil Strawson and Richard Hunt
programme: I Can Cook on the Go
method: Cut the cucumber into four pieces. Mix the apple, carrot and beetroot together in a mixing bowl. Stir in the cream cheese until well combined. Fill each piece of cucumber with a little of the cream cheese mixture. Sprinkle each filled piece of cucumber with raisins. Wrap separately in cling film and chill in the fridge until needed.
ingredients: ½ cucumber, sliced in half lengthways, seeds scraped out using a teaspoon,  20g/¾oz apple, grated ,  20g/¾oz carrot, grated ,  20g/¾oz cooked beetroot, grated,  30g/1¼oz cream cheese,  15g/½oz raisins
